attributes.action: Permit Any serving Gurkha Regement to live within the U.K
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Here are a group of people who put their lives on the line for US, and are being treated worse than Cannon Fodder when finished with and sent back into poverty, and yet they are still do it with PRIDE for us.SO let US treat them with RESPECT and give them the CHOICE of staying or going back,NOT JUST WE'VE HAD ENOUGH you can go home now

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
